trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor base class for Web server controls that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base do editor de componentes para controles de servidor Web derivados da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" />.

trans-unit.source: A component editor provides a user interface for editing the properties of a control.
trans-unit.target: Um editor de componente fornece uma interface de usuário para editar as propriedades de um controle.

trans-unit.source: Component editors are invoked from control designers by using the **Property Builder** menu item from the context menu on the control.
trans-unit.target: Editores de componente são chamados de designers de controle usando o **propriedade construtor** item de menu no menu de contexto do controle.

trans-unit.source: Component editors that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> class are invoked from designers derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class, and are used to edit the properties of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Editores de componente que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> classe são chamados de designers derivados de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> classe e são usados para editar as propriedades de controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: For examples of such controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos de tais controles, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method displays a component editor for the associated control, if one can be created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> método exibe um editor de componente para o controle associado, se ele pode ser criado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A> method returns the index of the initial page to be displayed in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A> método retorna o índice da página inicial a ser exibida no editor de componente.

trans-unit.source: The index in the array of page control types, of the initial page to display.
trans-unit.target: O índice na matriz de tipos de controle de página da página inicial a ser exibida.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: A designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class creates a component editor that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> class, when the user selects **Property Builder** from the context menu within the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um designer que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> classe cria um editor de componente que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> classe, quando o usuário seleciona **propriedade construtor** no menu de contexto dentro do designer.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que pode ser usado para obter informações de contexto adicionais.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />, which represents the component to edit.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que implementa o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />, que representa o componente a ser editado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> that represents the parent window.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> que representa a janela pai.

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified component by using the specified context descriptor and parent window.
trans-unit.target: Edita o componente especificado usando a janela pai e o descritor de contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> the component was successfully edited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> o componente foi editado com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method gets a <xref:System.Type> array of page control types by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> método obtém um <xref:System.Type> matriz de tipos de controle de página usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> object, and then calls its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> method to display the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Ele cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> objeto e, em seguida, chama seus <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> método para exibir o editor do componente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages" /> method must have been overridden to return a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> array of page control types.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages" /> método deve ter sido substituído para retornar um <see cref="T:System.Type" /> matriz de tipos de controle de página.

trans-unit.source: This array must exist in order for the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent" /> method to succeed.
trans-unit.target: Essa matriz deve existir para que o <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent" /> método tenha êxito.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the initial page to display in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da página inicial a ser exibida no editor de componentes.

trans-unit.source: The index of the initial page in the array.
trans-unit.target: O índice da página inicial na matriz.

trans-unit.source: The initial page is specified when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> object is created.
trans-unit.target: A página inicial é especificada quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> objeto é criado.
